name: Ext_R5_Consent_sourceAttachment
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Consent.sourceAttachment for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Consent.sourceAttachment from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Consent|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Source from which this consent is taken
element.definition: The source on which this consent statement is based. The source might be a scanned original paper form.
element.comment: `Consent.sourceAttachment` maps to R4B `Consent.source[x]`.  Changed from an array to a single value (max cardinality from * to 1). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
